tag.name: kbd
tag.description: text to be entered by the user

attribute.name: accept
attribute.description: list of MIME types for file upload

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: for radio buttons and check boxes

attribute.name: cite
attribute.description: URI for source document or msg

attribute.name: codebase
attribute.description: base URI for classid, data, archive

attribute.name: colspan
attribute.description: number of cols spanned by cell

attribute.name: coords
attribute.description: for use with client-side image maps

attribute.name: defer
attribute.description: UA may defer execution of script

attribute.name: frame
attribute.description: which parts of frame to render

attribute.name: headers
attribute.description: list of id's for header cells

attribute.name: href
attribute.description: URI that acts as base URI

attribute.name: media
attribute.description: designed for use with these media

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: HTTP method used to submit the form

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: allows applets to find each other

attribute.name: ondblclick
attribute.description: a pointer button was double clicked

attribute.name: onkeypress
attribute.description: a key was pressed and released

attribute.name: onload
attribute.description: all the frames have been loaded

attribute.name: onmousedown
attribute.description: a pointer button was pressed down

attribute.name: onunload
attribute.description: all the frames have been removed

attribute.name: rowspan
attribute.description: number of rows spanned by cell

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: for use with client-side image maps

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: specific to each type of field

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: base font size for FONT elements

attribute.name: span
attribute.description: default number of columns in group

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: what kind of widget is needed
